message: DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug where reference topology was not being correctly set for 'rms perres'. Also add some debug info which can be used to help diagnose any future issues with the masks. This should be incorporated into the AT15 release if possible.

DRR - Cpptraj: NOE data will now be associated with DataSet_double if necessary (could also be assocated with any other data set now). Fix up append functionality in DataSet_double and DataSet_string.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix implicit conversion of int to size_t. Not technically a problem since it gets converted back to int in ClusterSieve  but better to be correct and consistent.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix ordering of dacdif args. Modify NcTest so args are passed to DoTest
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up virtual function definitions. Add function to return unit cell matrix.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix column width in standard data output when no x column and label is long to prevent label truncation.
DRR - Cpptraj: Replace FinalSoluteResidue() function in Topology. Fix actions that used to use it so systems that have solute-solvent-solute etc are now correctly handled.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix ensemble trajectory timing for RunEnsemble. Add 'Other' run timing category and make Time_Summary const.
DRR - Cpptraj: Make ensembleComm split for no ensemble mode again consistent with ngroups == 1 and fix masterComm split. Add '==' operator.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix initialization of coords and charge arrays for libpme. Actually perform the energy calc. Enable output of timing info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix cluster keywords for split  add option for printing number of clusters observed per time window.
DRR - Cpptraj: Split up adding input trajin vs ensemble function  fix function calls.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix netcdf cluster matrix write under openmp. Kills the scaling but doesnt segfault anymore.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix binary location logic. Previously some important binary vars would remain unset if CPPTRAJ explicitly specified.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix AddVal function so that previous values are actually incremented (fixes solvent hbond lifetime calculation bug)
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up variable/function names in ClusterNode to better reflect what they represent/do (dont conflate best representative frame with centroid).
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up mask trajectory output so traj is only initialized once. Remove obsolete function from Trajout_Single.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug in projection of dihedral covariance that led to incorrect results/memory errors. Update internal help text.
DRR - Cpptraj: avg command  Fix up output formatting some more  use data file list  add option to not print header.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix wrong VID for indices (doesnt matter for release since indices info not present)
DRR - Cpptraj: Start reworking Command. Fix location of enumerated type RetType in Cpptraj.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix nastruct sync. Use less than in rank loop as a sanity check. Use Darray typedef for allocation.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix reading of CONECT records when there is leading whitespace in number and no space between consecutive numbers. In Topology::AddBonds  add check for out-of-range atom #s.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix a couple of mistakes in normalization that led to incorrect calculation of Cj(t). Results still don't seem optimal  but are getting there.

DRR - Cpptraj: Finish updating routines to use new Trajin/Ensemble split. Progress bars for crdaction and crdout should now be correct when crdframes specified. Merge SetTotalFrames into CheckFrameArgs in TrajFrameCounter. Fix ambpdb files.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix # hbonds in nastruct on first frame read in by non-master
DRR - Cpptraj: Start adding platform-specific checks. Fix BLAS options so they override -amberlib if it was specified.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up normalization. Add relaxation/noe calc. #s seem better than what they were in ptraj but still off from the test data set. Needs more testing.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug in 'crdaction' where wrong frame was being used for actions that modify topology info. Also make 'crdaction' respect 'noprogress'.
DRR - Cpptraj: Remove sander energy from energy action. Fix swapping of Box in Frame.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix from C. Nguyen for GIST  correctly compare to 4 closest waters instead of only the closest water.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up some of the defaults for the cpptraj-sander interface. Now works well as long as topology is not modified. Next step is to use prmtop_struct
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix parsing of direction string in replicatecell so values other than 1 can be used. Treat SKIP as ERR in crdaction.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix nonbond energy loop so all solvent solvent interactions are calcd. Still seems to be off.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix pairdist sync. Remaining errors appear to be round-off due to the way the Stats class accumulates data
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix determination of whether libcpptraj.so can be built  rules do not belong in config files. Also fixes default make behavior for standalone.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix behavior of 'clear' and 'debug'  now works properly again for Topology/Reference. Also provide more/better feedback.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix compile errors with older Intel compilers on older platforms.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix compile errors with older Intel compilers on older platforms (again). See d5ef20bea17323...
DRR - Cpptraj: frame index array only needed for MPI so each thread knows where to send/receive frames. Fix NOSORT case.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add scaledihedralk  fix DispatchObject type of parmbox  solvent  parmstrip  and parmwrite
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix potential memory errors in comparetop when one or both topologies are missing certain types of information.
DRR - Cpptraj: Actually enable command in command list  fix residue numbering
DRR - Cpptraj: Make PDBWRITEMODE public again to fix pytraj build (and add a note so I don't forget).
DRR - Cpptraj: Add timers to PDB read. Fix up bond search iterators. Update dependencies.
DRR - Cpptraj: Only write GB params when present. Fix size of ITREE  JOIN  and IROTAT sections.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix error in base pair step determiniation for parallel steps and invalid memory access for terminal base pairs.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix SetTruncOct so that lengths are equal to X and not just all set to zero. Add rout ine to print box info to STDOUT.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix VAC function plot X axis label and minimum value.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix average action so trajout knows there is only one frame to be written. Update test output.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue where first character of new buffer could sometimes be overwritten by character from previous buffer.
DRR - Cpptraj: Enable xtc detection and fix standalone build (AT build still needs fixing).
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug in Hungarian algorithm. Implement new algorithm for zero crossing which seems to behave better.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add explicit cast to fix compilation problem with PGI compilers.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix setting of residue atom numbers and original residue numbers
DRR - Cpptraj: Make wavelet use ByteString. Also fix output of number of frames and atoms when reporting matrix size.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix line-length detection in PDB  no longer reports false positives.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix replica offsets in output. Improve help text.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix SetFrame() for case where forces allocated but velocities not allocated.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up cell translate vector generation indices. Take init stuff out of constructor.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add new DataSet_Coords class that will be used in rms2d to fix thread safety issues.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix ClusterList for new cluster classes. Add GetElement() to DataSet_Cmatrix.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix memory leaks during automatic detection of traj/parm files on command line.
DRR - Cpptraj: Try to be smart about appending. Fix set count when DYNA> section is ignored
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix program for finding dependencies  '#' must be first non-whitespace character on line.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up Cpptraj class for Cmd  update dependencies.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix rms2d output when masks are different. Previous output was flipped w.r.t convention (down is tgt  across is ref).
DRR - Cpptraj: Add assigned cluster name to 'split' output. Fix up some const stuff.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up float data set. Disable access to double internal array until its clear that this is needed.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix remdtraj tests in ensemble (all work now). Add test title to RequiresThreads warning.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up replica exchange accept calc. Remove/hide some debug info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up info for netcdf formats. Hide some debug info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix force unit conversion. Consolidate frame read.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix write of output trajectories in ensemble mode when frames have been modified. This needs to be in AT15.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix KDE histogram X label  make it the legend of input data set.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix test.short target so set up is not done for every test.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix calc of frac coords so it matches sander. Begin gridding routine
DRR - Cpptraj: Hide some debug info. Fix test name. Re-enable tests that were accidentally removed.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix order of evaluations leading to small memory error. Hide debug info

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up bond determination from coordinates. Parameter formats now indicate whether they are capable of a bond search or not. Bond searching can still be explicitly specified with the 'bondsearch' keyword  a warning will be written if bond searching is not possible. Fix up and re-enable reading of CONECT records from PDB files.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix determination of element from PDB file when element field is only 1 char wide.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up initial seed selection. Add functions that will be needed for kmeans to ClusterNode.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue when reading old amber topology files with large integers in pointers section.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix reading of some old style Amber topology files  where number of pointers is not always consistent.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add some debug info. Fix TI output label
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix tests in parallel at higher process counts (#599). Good up to 32 processes now.
DRR - Cpptraj: calcstate: improve output options  fix lifetime curves of size 1.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix summation and add missing factor of 1/2. Improve debug output.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug where orthorhombic imaging would fail for a dimension when subsequent dimension is imaged in same step due to too many 'else if's.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix autoimage centering to box center for general triclinic cells.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up binary suffix determination for tests. Add 'cuda' test option.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up normalization and automatic min/max/step/bins determination.
DRR - Cpptraj: Improve calculation speed a bit. Fix small memory error.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix reading in of data from mdout when energy terms appear/vanish
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up some things with multi exponential fit. Results still seem strange...
DRR - Cpptraj: Add index of min and max to avg  also fix up formatting.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up reference access in command/control structure  start fixing data IO.
DRR - Cpptraj: Update test output for fix from previous commit
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up IRED test input so it matches modern syntax.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add missing resinfo entry  fix solvent DispatchObject type
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix test output for corrected degrees of freedom calc
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix centroid calc for symmetric rmsd cluster distance metric (frames were not being translated to origin).
DRR - Cpptraj: Add missing test file and fix clean for two tests.
DRR - Cpptraj: Move trajectory processing mode vars to CpptrajState. Fix error in RunAnalyses()
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up dihedrals so they can be used in DihedralSearch. Add some functions to DataSet.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add barrier and flush to fix order of printout in parallel.
DRR - Cpptraj: Attempt to fix appveyor error: '"environment" section must be a mapping.'
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix updating periodic centroids by storing sum extra info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix output trajectory setup for AmbPDB
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up PSF title  angles  dihedrals  atom type write.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix lifetime output dimensions
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix 2D gnuplot output when not using 'map'

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix lifetime curve file name setup when not using windows
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix foptflags when tuning. Change tuneflags to hostflags to avoid confusion with vtuneflags.
DRR - Cpptraj: Update test for fix to dbscan sieve restore by centroid
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix atomicfluct sync. Actions that check frames should check TrajoutNum.
DRR - Cpptraj: Initial attempt to fix # expected frames to be written for trajout
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix AddState so extra pH values arent added.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix order in DoTest (matters when dacdif is in use)

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix restoration of sieved frames in DBSCAN when sievetoframe not specified (now correctly identifies noise).
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix error trapping when adding actions/analyses
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix exclusion list generation when not all atoms are selected
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix TRR traj default title

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix clustering when no coordinates specified by adding nocoords option.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix volmap sync  differences appear to be roundoff.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix quoted string handling in CIF file record
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix runavg in parallel. Will only match serial if coordinates are not modified beforehand (by e.g. 'rms')
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix 2 character element name recognition in PDB files.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up sander interface. GB energies appear to work well.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix indexing for self translational entropy calc
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix reading mdout from pmemd TI

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up pseudo-F calc: only use frames that are in clusters (ignore noise)  do not calculate if # clusters < 2 or # clusters == # frames  protect from divide by zero. Fix problem where incorrect use of ClusterNode could cause a segfault. Symmetric RMSD interface back to what it was.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix advancing through file  add debug info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue where 1 character non-whitespace strings would be cleared in RemoveTrailingWhitespace().

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix var name in OutputTrajCommon. Trajout_Single now passes out OutputTrajCommon  also fix up function names to better reflect what they do and add new combined Init/Setup routine (as Prepare).

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix column widths in standard data file write and restore them if necessary.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix minor issue  sometimes tried to tokenize end of file.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for # threads
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix off by one issue in -ms output.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for multiple threads
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up timecorr. Shared data set no longer used - should be enough to just have shared data file for dipolar output.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for # threads
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for # threads
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix minor issue where savenreps would sometimes save fewer than the requested number of representatives.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix cap info read. Only write radii set if not empty
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up timing data.

DRR - Cpptraj: MPI debug stuff. Fix ifdef indents in CpptrajStdio. Change DEBUGMPI define to PARALLEL_DEBUG_VERBOSE. Make mprintf/mprinterr routines also have threads write to individual output files when PARALLEL_DEBUG_VERBOSE. Fix up rprinterr in parallel so everything ends up on one line.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue where data files would be written to by all threads during parallel trajin when write not called from DataFileList
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix data file format help
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up average output when writing to COORDS set. Print number of frames average is over.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up integer data set
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix .gro file detection
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up for OpenMP. Allow KDE to be calcd with different number of threads than normal if desired.

DRR - Cpptraj: Major changes to reference handling. Create separate array to track reference frames in DataSetList. Only have specialized routine for getting reference frame via arg list (ref  refindex  reference). Fix data set wildcard matching to account for file name if present. Fix selection of coords data sets  add selection by group. Update DataSet_Coords_REF to match.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue with inverting integer atom mask (#384).
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix memory allocation for sorted ph data set. Check number of frames when sorting.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up index column detection and data set reading in DataIO_Std
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix variable name
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix data set constructor
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix clang++/gfortran linking on OSX (I hope)
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix issue that was preventing loadcrd from appending to existing COORDS set.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for number of threads
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up omp thread vars. Add but do not enable kdist calcDRR - Cpptraj: Fix up omp thread vars. Add but do not enable kdist calc

DRR - Cpptraj: Finish initial incarnation of kmeans clustering  results match ptraj for small test data set. Fix up # clusters option so it matches hieragglo and ptraj  update help. When # of points changing clusters is zero exit loop. Fix bug in picking initial seed frames.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix detection of gnu compilers when they are really clang on OSX
DRR - Cpptraj: In calcstate  fix mangled printf format  correctly set number of frames.
DRR - Cpptraj: Allow N_THREADS to be set via environment variable. Fix up help.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix problem where loading multiple trajectories into a TRAJ Coords DataSet would fail  fix info message for TRAJ Coords DataSet.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix data set name issue.
DRR - Cpptraj: Actually finish up fixing ParmIO classes for FileName  fix TopologyList for File::NameArray  fix DataSetList handling in RPNcalc.
DRR - Cpptraj: For clang with gfortran linking  ensure system library searched before libgfortran path. This is actually a re-fix (see here: https://github.com/Amber-MD/cpptraj/pull/473).
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix processing of include files relative to last file included. Fix handling of section reads when other directives may be present.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix allocation of temp array for forces/velocities  fix write of forces

Update CMake submodule  and fix CI scripts for new version

Improve cross-compilation detection and fix cpptraj building on msys2 (need to explicitly link libquadmath).

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up parsing of volmap arguments - should now correctly handle 'data'. Also print better info on grid when it is set up. Remove extra DataSet_3D functions having to do with binning in favor of an explicit interface to GridBin.
DRR - Cpptraj: More changes for using CpptrajFile*. Fix issue in mask test where mask file from one command was always being overwritten.

DRR - Cpptraj: Change default for hb cutoff back to 3.5  reduce vertical separation cutoff to 2.0 (still may be a bit too big). Fix base pair step determination  base pairs are indexed by residue number.
DRR - Cpptraj: Get rid of USE_WINDOWS variable in favor of the PLATFORM variable. Make sure TestProgram uses LDFLAGS. Fix up GNU static compile by adding in lquadmath. Add binary suffix code.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix pairwise so energies are correctly printed w.r.t. cutoffs. Experimenting with different coordinate output file types  the cut mol2 may not be very useful...

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug  when ensemble processing with a single thread it was possible for subsequent ensemble members to work on a modified parm instead of the original one (e.g. for actions like strip/closest)  which could lead to unintended consequences.
DRR - Cpptraj: Fix up code doc for imaged distance routines. Only use floor() in imaging routines for backwards compat  not necessary in distance routines.
DRR - Cpptraj: To fix tests on appveyor: per Robert T. McGibbon's suggestion  set PRINTF_EXPONENT_DIGITS environment variable to force mingw-64 compiler to use 2 exponent digits.
DRR - Cpptraj: Start setting up config.h link variables. Fix include path for bundled libraries. Reduce the number of global script variables. Add install directory check

DRR - Cpptraj: Remove Trajin/Ensemble flags from Parallel  Actions etc do not need to worry about what type of run is happening  they can just check the communicators. The ensemble and trajectory communicators have been moved from EnsembleIn to Parallel which just makes more sense - no need to create separate communicators for each input trajectory/ensemble. In CpptrajState  add trajectories to trajinList_ inside of SetTrajMode() because during ENSEMBLE SetTrajMode() needs to know about about ensemble communicator ranks  and the ensemble comm is not set up until the ensemble itself is. Use the ensemble/trajectory comms where appropriate instead of the world comm (except in the single ensemble traj  but that is a problem for another day). I am pretty sure that parallel traj read in ensemble will not work just yet  but it is close to working.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix for output format on windows. It seems that before visual studio 2015 the compilers resulted in printf code that always used 3 digits in exponents whether needed or not  which is not in keeping with the C specification:   "...The exponent always contains at least two digits  and only as many more digits as necessary to represent the exponent." (7.21.6.1 8) This caused spurious test failures on the appveyor build. So  if we are using < Visual Studio 2015 call a function that forces 2 digit exponents.

DRR - Cpptraj: Some fixes attempting to get the tests to complete on appveyor. First  pass in 'summary' before other options in the summary target. Second and more importantly  the '-cpptraj' option was never being correctly passed anyway. If you look at the output from appveyor  'cpptraj' was being run  not 'cpptraj.exe':   Using cpptraj:   -rwxr-xr-x 1 appveyor None 33584277 Dec 15 16:50 ../../bin/cpptraj This is because in the original appveyor.yml the argument to OPT was not quoted:   sh -lc "cd test  make test OPT=-cpptraj $(pwd)/../bin/cpptraj.exe" So OPT was being set to only '-cpptraj'. I think that in a cygwin-like environment if you run 'binary' its the same as 'binary.exe' so remove the OPT and see how it goes.
DRR - Cpptraj: Create separate 'doeij' GIST test with coarser grid to reduce memory usage. Entire GIST test should now need no more than ~25 MB of memory (previously required ~5 GB!).

DRR - Cpptraj: Switch from std::locale to cctype. For some weird reason I started getting segmentation faults on my local machine (Fedora 22  4.3.4-200.fc22.x86_64) with ambpdb in certain functions - valgrind showed that the faults originated in locale() (from the C++ library). Since using cctype functions instead makes the segfaults go away and there is no real downside to using cctype here  make the switch.
DRR - Cpptraj: '-shared' option automatically turns off sander API for libcpptraj build. If the '/src/main.o' object file is detected in source dir  clean the source dir after configure.

DRR - Cpptraj: In the readline subdirectory  have both the 'clean' and 'uninstall' targets remove libreadline.a in addition to all objects. This is the safest thing to do  guarantees that the compile will match what is configured  and does not really add much to compile time.

Ensure actual ensemble size is used when setting up ensemble trajout list even when MPI (Trajout_Multi requires actual # to set up onlymembers even though it is not used afterwards) - probably will pass in some additional info later on (temperatures etc). Actions are performed prior to trajectory output  TrajoutList has already-sorted list of frame pointers passed to it (removing need for Frame indices to also be passed in).

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix bug where segfault could occur when running secstruct with ptrajformat if line length became > CpptrajFile internal buffer size. Now when ptrajformat each residue gets a string dataset  similar to the default output with integer data set.

DRR - Cpptraj: Do not try to sync vect2 if empty  also no need to sync by-residue matrix if allocated since it is allocated in Print() (both fix MPI_Reduce() with null issue under OpenMPI).

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix calculation of final histogram from 'pairdist' in parallel. Due to the way pairdist resizes the histogram on the fly  it results in different bin counts if the bin is not present on all frames and on all threads. The current way around this is to add a new keyword  maxdist  which sets the histogram initial size to something reasonable so all bins are present. Add a warning if this keyword is not used in parallel. There are differences if the keyword is not used in serial but they tend to be much  much smaller.
DRR - Cpptraj: Only allow differences for pairdist during parallel. Differences result from the fact that averages in pairdist are calculated incrementally on each thread.

DRR - Cpptraj: Switch to using std::vector<int> for remd_indices_ instead of a C-array  which makes lots of code much  much easier to read  cleaner  and safer. I originally didn't use vector since I needed to interface with the NetCDF C routines  but I think I've thoroughly convinced myself that std::vector storage is *always* contiguous. If there is some weird C++ implementation out there where this is not the case it's violating the '03 standard anyway  which at this point (11 years on) should be the minimum we support anyway.

DRR - Cpptraj: For standard data output  modify X column behavior as follows: if the step is set and has a fractional component set the X col width/precision to either the data width/precision or the current width/precision  whichever is larger. If the set is XYMESH but step has not been set (so we do not know spacing between X values) use default precision. Otherwise the step has no fractional component so make the precision zero.

DRR - Cpptraj: In dssp code add some debug info that will be used to fix/improve dssp calc. Recognize CYX as cysteine for assignment output. Improve code comments.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add warning that parallel netcdf traj output not available when compiling MPI without parallel netcdf.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix DSSP calc so it better takes into account SS priority  which fixes odd SS patterns reported by H. Huang from the Simmerling group (e.g. 2-residue alpha helices). Also  correctly convert 3-10 helices < 3 residues and Pi helices < 5 residues to turn (according to the original DSSP algorithm). Add useful debug info that must eventually be turned off.
DRR - Cpptraj: Get rid of continue statements in DoAction() loops. Disable debug info.
DRR - Cpptraj: Blank nproc.exe rule for windows build

DRR - Cpptraj: More major fixes to DSSP calc. When calculating average at end  calculate for residues that have data  not just residues that are selected since when using different topology selection status may change. Add missing Bend SS calculation. Streamline code and update comments.
DRR - Cpptraj: Only build 'nproc' if MPI to avoid single processor/OMP build (which gives bad results during testing).

DRR - Cpptraj: Add progress bars.

DRR - Cpptraj: Another significant change to data set handling in DataIO classes. For output  DataSet routine now has Coords() routine that returns the value of the coordinate instead of writing it to a file  should be more efficient in cases where the same coordinate has to be written over and over. Should be OK  right now there is no case where the coordinate is anything but a double precision value. Fix up Gnuplot output so that TextFormat and DataSet::SizeArray are used. Appending on data set reading is now done at the time of the read - no more buffering and potentially converting from DataSet_double to DataSet_XYMESH. All numerical data sets are now read in as XYMESH  this will cost more memory but is ultimately much easier to maintain - Grace and Std DataIO input both changed this way. Consolidate RemoveSet/PopSet in DataSetList and get rid of obsolete ParseArgString header. Add TextFormat routine for changing format width only.

DRR - Cpptraj: Adding the ability to save time values from trajectories when present has led to a semi-major refactoring of the way trajectory metadata (i.e. are velocities  temperatures  time values etc present for trajin  or should they be present for trajout?) is handled. Output trajectories and actions can now have some idea of whether this metadata is present in input trajectories and act accordingly. For example  time values present in input restarts will now be written to output restarts or netcdf trajectories  and blank time values will no longer be written to output netcdf trajectories when not present in input trajectories. Velocity information will now be correctly included unless 'novelocity' is specified  etc. Some tests  as well as internal version number updated.

DRR - Cpptraj: More fixes and cleanup for the matrix action. The by-atom matrix is now always saved in the main data set list  if by-residue output is desired an additional matrix is created instead. The topology is no longer saved  all necessary data for averaging is now saved (masses  residues). Clean up averaging by mask. Store number of snapshots in matrix data set (where it really belongs).

DRR - Cpptraj: Matrix types now part of DataSet::scalarType enumerated type. This fixes the issue of certain data sets improperly overloading DataSet::Type  which prevented the base type of these sets from being determined. It simplifies things from a code standpoint (why should there be multiple arrays of types?). Make some exposed arrays in DataSet private (the way they should have been). The 'diagmatrix' routine will now print a warning when a matrix has more columns than snapshots used to generate it  instead of printing this warning when the matrix is generated (which is far more easily lost). Also fix dependencies.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fixes/improvements to the cpptraj AT build process. - Change build targets so that they are consistent with the rest of Amber (i.e. serial  parallel  openmp). This allows a single build rule for cpptraj in AmberTools/src that can be used no matter what the install type. - Add 'libcpptraj' target to AmberTools build and add '-shared' option to standalone configure that can be used to build standalone libcpptraj - prevent the standalone one from being built if not configured with '-shared'. - Remove libcpptraj from the AT serial build target. - Change the pytraj rule from 'make cpptraj' to 'make libcpptraj'  which is actually all it needs. Create separate libcpptraj target for AmberTools since AT/standalone depend on different things (also consistent with how the build is currently split). - Remove obsolete libclean rule. - Do not include the readline library in libcpptraj (probably a lot more stuff that pytraj doesnt need can be removed from the lib as well). - Add standalone uninstall rule. - Remove unused configure_pytraj - should not be necessary.

DRR - Cpptraj: Improvements to DataSet selection. DataSets can now be selected using wildcard chars '*' and '?'  so one could for example specify C?[Life*] to get C1[Lifetime]  C2[Lifelink]  etc. There are now two matching routines for DataSet  an exact one and one that allows wildcards/ranges. DataSetList::GetSet() has been made obsolete  replaced entirely by CheckForSet(). DataSet selection in DataSetList has been simplified so that there are two main routines called by all selection routines (one exact  one wildcard). Cpptraj will also now correctly warn if a set argument selects multiple sets but the calling Action/Analysis/etc only expected one.

DRR - Cpptraj: Start to split Ensemble functionality from Trajin functionality. Trajin_Multi was a hybrid of Trajin/Ensemble functionality  now Trajin means "one frame at a time" and Ensemble means "array of frames at a time". Also reduce the level of inheritance from 3 to 2 (base and child only). Common functionality is largely moved to InputTrajCommon and TrajFrameCounter classes. This makes the code a little less obscure  although many more changes are needed.

DRR - Cpptraj: Add CpptrajFile list to DataFileList  the idea is to treat raw text output from Actions (like e.g. average solute-solute hbonds from hbond) just like data files. This will allow a single text data file from multiple actions if desired and avoid accidental overwrites.

origin of grid is corrected by shifting -0.5*grid_spacing. This will only change the origin location of the grid. All previous data is still correct but for the shifted origin (with respect to the center of grid input).

DRR - Cpptraj: Make NetCDF nc_strerror and attribute error messages warnings instead since they are not always fatal (e.g. when getting a title that's not there). Make failing to get the spatial VID a non-fatal warning that the file may not be Amber-compliant  but if spatial VID is present make sure it contains 'x'  'y'  'z'.
DRR - Cpptraj: Clean up and clarify atoms out of order/no molecules error message.

DRR - Cpptraj: Add 'submask' keyword to molsurf action to calculate contribution of atom subsets to overall area. I dont think it works 100% yet  seems there are some components of the area which are not yet divided among atoms.
DRR - Cpptraj: Make validInteger and validDouble routines infinitely more robust. This among other things prevents e.g. 'reference 2EBO.pdb' from thinking 2EBO.pdb is an integer.
DRR - Cpptraj: For backwards compatibility with ptraj  support 'chi' as alias for 'chin' in 'dihedral' command.

DRR - Cpptraj: Split ARPACK from BLAS/LAPACK defines. Can now be configured with '-noarpack'  which only disables ARPACK requirement (also improved the check for BLAS/LAPACK in configure). When ARPACK is not used  all eigenvectors will be calculated but only the specified number saved. This can get very expensive for large numbers of eigenvectors  but is the only thing in cpptraj that is affected.
DRR - Cpptraj: Enable and update pucker and radgyr
DRR - Cpptraj: Add test for new diffusion syntax
DRR - Cpptraj: Enable write of initial graph when 2D and debug level set.
DRR - Cpptraj: Store individual diffusion sets as float to save memory.

DRR - Cpptraj: Add timing data to diffusion and DataSetList. This helped identify that the bottleneck in new diffusion when calculating individual diffusion was creation of individual data sets in Setup(). Add new routine to DataSetList that does not check for already existing sets. For certain Actions like diffusion where sets are added in Setup/DoAction after sets have already been added in Init this should work OK since the Init sets serve as a check for clashes with DataSet Name. Should probably implement a faster search of the DataSetList...
DRR - Cpptraj: Resize individual set list sizes outside loop. Change divide to multiply by 1/N
DRR - Cpptraj: Improve output
DRR - Cpptraj: Add some code for allocating non-orthogonal grid. Add box origin offset to non-orthogonal grid bin calc.
DRR - Cpptraj: New GridBin classes to handle both orthogonal and non-orthogonal grids.

DRR - Cpptraj: Add label  slope  intercept  and correlation for diffusion constant calc from MSD vs time line. Add option to redirect diffusion constant etc data to data file. Add option to turn off MSD vs time calc. Turn off MSD vs time calc for old style syntax.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add test for diffusion const calc.
DRR - Cpptraj: Initial code for calculating diffusion constants inside diffusion command. Improve error messages in LinearRegression.
DRR - Cpptraj: Modify code so new GridBin class is used. Add routine to Box for determining box parameters from unit cell matrix.
DRR - Cpptraj: Can now redirect linear fit stats to CpptrajFile

DRR - Cpptraj: Make 'out' keyword for writing all data to single file and 'separateout' for writing different diffusion types to different files  former useful for average only  latter useful when calculating individual diffusion values.

DRR - Cpptraj: Protect several actions from attempting to use nonbond parameters when none are present in topology. Do not exit ActionList setup loop when noExitOnError is set. Protect against segfaults in gist and pairwise when action was initialized but not set up.

DRR - Cpptraj: Update diffusion test for slightly different output (only whitespace change and precision of X value is now 0 when step is 1). Ensure old format file args are not reset for different output files.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add version of AddDataFile that does not reset incoming arguments.

DRR - Cpptraj: Update grid IO routines to recognize and allocate non-orthogonal grids.
DRR - Cpptraj: Add new syntax to diffusion but still support old one. Requires checking that arguments are potential masks and allowing DataFile type to be specified in DataFileList.

Tweaks so we can start testing clang on Travis.

DRR - Cpptraj: Split Dimension into Dimension  which is used for coordinate output  and HistBin  which is used for histogramming. The DataFile arguments now work on any subsequent set added to the DataFile.

DRR - Cpptraj: Set default min/step for time series in DataSetList  and make blank step == 0. This fixes issues where some analyses would fail because default min/step previously was being set up only upon DataFile write  but not yet working with DataFile arguments (like 'time').

DRR - Cpptraj: Always search for molecules in CommonSetup (was effectively the default behavior previously). For backwards compatibility  always overwrite Topology box info with traj box info during trajin/ensemble.

DRR - Cpptraj: When adding data sets to DataSetList push to main list first (otherwise setting active reference doesnt work for first reference added). Use c_str() again for brief Topology info. Remove obsolete commented out code.

DRR - Cpptraj: Instead of turning off things libcpptraj does not need at configure time  create a new defined called LIBCPPTRAJ which can be used at compile time to disable things like readline and sanderlib. This allows the cpptraj executable to be built with these things while excluding them from libcpptraj without re-configuring. Should finally address #220 (I hope).
DRR - Cpptraj: Do not include libcpptraj as an install target. Since it now deletes objects required by cpptraj  parallel makes with both of these targets active will fail.

DRR - Cpptraj: Instead of removing and rebuilding objects that must be changed for libcpptraj  compile them into separate *.LIBCPPTRAJ.o objects. This allows such objects to automatically include the -DLIBCPPTRAJ flag as part of the build instead of passing it via a separate make instance  which means parallel makes with both targets now work again.

DRR - Cpptraj: Fix segfault for 'help analyze'. The 'analyze' prefix was being treated as a special keyword which meant 'search only the analysis list for command'. However  this meant that when used in conjunction with 'help'  the 'analyze' would be stripped away and the entire string would be null. This makes 'analyze' a command which searches the analysis list and then adds the command to the state  which is a better way of doing things anyway.
